snippet: The decline in car sales reflects the fact that economic stagnation continues to depress demand in the European Union.
abstract: European new car sales fall 10.2 percent in March from year-ago March, falling to 1.3 million vehicles from 1.5 million; decline has lasted 18 consecutive months, reflecting fact that economic stagnation continues to depress demand.
lead_paragraph: The decline in car sales reflects the fact that economic stagnation continues to depress demand in the European Union.

headline.seo: New-Car Sales Fall 10.2% in Europe, Continuing Slump
headline.main: New-Car Sales Fall 10.2% in Europe, Continuing Slump
headline.print_headline: New-Car Sales Fall 10.2% in Europe, Continuing Slump
